Automatically rewinds %d seconds after manual pausing. Support Translations Support and suggestions About Google Play An open source PlayBooks audiobook player. PlayBooks is based on the open source Voice application.

I would be very grateful if you leave a review or rating about the application on Google Play, it will greatly help the development of the project.
Licenses Support PlayBooks Unlocks extra features, such as black theme and all theme colors.

The source code of PlayBooks is available on GitHub. You are welcome to compile the full version yourself for free. However, if you want to support the development and receive updates through the Google Play, consider purchasing full version.

Thank you,
Goodwy goodwy.dev@gmail.com PlayBooks Lifebuoy Support and Suggestions Send Email Paul Woitaschek for contributing to the source code Voice.

Enjoying PlayBooks? Share some love and rate us on Google Play! It is very important for us. Support project Get PlayBooks Dark Theme Dark theme uses less power on AMOLED displays. Click to enable the dark theme, will remain in effect until the application is restarted. Colors Carefully picked color themes, as well as color palettes recommended for use in Android and iOS. Support us PlayBooks Lite is free, ad-free, Open Source and it will always remain that way. With your help we are able to implement more features and make PlayBooks even better. Lifebuoy If you cannot afford this PlayBooks, but really want to use it, then write me an email.
